name: Ah..Moemory Lite
description:
Ah...Moemory is a pairs/matches game inspired by japanese moe and anime culture.
No matter if you are otaku or not, the game with its adorable graphics will pull you in.
No matter what age you are, the cute graphics will captivate you.
No matter if you simply want to have fun or train your brain, this is the game for you.
The rounds themselves are over fairly fast making the game the perfect pick for the train or subway.
Be careful though, you might loose track of the time while playing round after round!

We feature the very best and latest of japanese comic art.
Here you get highest quality for free.
One thing is for sure: You will certainly feel better after playing this game.

Features:
*Beautiful graphics and animation
*Unique artwork from talented artists (9 card pictures, 3 background pictures)
*Easy to use
*Train your memory while playing
*Localized in English/Japanese/German
*Suitable for all ages
*Fun & Free :-)

Stay tuned!

News:
*Full version is finally released! Look for "Ah..Moemory" on the AppStore to find it.
*Update coming soon:
This will enable you to restart the game from our homepage with a simple click on a link.
